storyInfo:
Operator Thorns accompanies Rhodes Island to Siesta for a day of relaxation.
When the sun started to set, the Ægirians, far from their home, encountered a mysterious enemy.

attributes.content: Hello? Excuse me? Is anyone home? There’s no way you’d be refusing to pick up again, right?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hello? Ah, ohh! There, there you are!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hey, I finally got through...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: You should’ve made it over there already, yeah? So, how’s Siesta?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Get a load of this. The Doctor said it’s so hot over there, people sometimes pass out on the streets. Then, they get woken up later with free beer. That true?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ah, by the way, which celebrities did they book for the music festival this time? Is the Emperor gonna be there?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh, have you seen anyone from Alive Until Sunset? I play their songs as my background music. Listen to this one—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If you have something to say, spit it out already. Otherwise, I’m hanging up.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Wait, hold up, c’mon bro, don’t be like that!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I do have something to tell you, so don’t hang up, man!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: If you wanted to come that badly, why aren’t you here?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Because I can’t, man! Did you think I wanted to stay behind?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Since all you guys went, someone had to stay behind on the ship. Plus, I also had some internal stuff to deal with. You know, that Gavial, she—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Stop. Don’t tell me about your missions.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Eh, it’s nothing classified. But still, there is that one thing that’s rather...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If it’s important, get to the point. Thirty words or less.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Not cool, bro.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Has anyone ever told you you can be a real wet blanket at times?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Poor chap. They must all be too afraid to tell you the truth.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I’m hanging up.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Fine, fine, I’ll cut to the chase!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The source isn’t that reliable but there might be some trouble at this music festival but since I know you don’t really care about that please ask for an autograph if you happen to bump into anyone from Alive Until Sunset! Big thanks in advance!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...Is that all?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh? Uh, yeah.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That was forty-five words. You went over by fifty percent.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: And, if you blast music at that volume in the office, the Engineering Department will be there to smash your stereo within ten seconds.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Wait a sec. Did you need something... Disturbing the work environment? What are you talking ab— ...Aaaah, my bad, ignore what I just said, seriously, it’s my fault, please stoppp—
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Just how much does this guy like that band?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I can almost recite the lyrics myself...... Hmm?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: The scenery out here is amazing, but it really is hot and humid! I can practically wring out my wet tail!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: The temperature here in Siesta seems even higher than I expected, which is weird... Hey, Skyfire, don’t you think so too?
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Considering the way we’re dressed, it’d be stranger not to be hot.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Eh, good point.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Everyone’s too dressed up anyway. Someone might seriously get heat stroke like this, so let’s get changed already... Besides, I heard we might have a chance to head down to the beach, so I brought a swimsuit.
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: Hold up, not yet! Weren’t we going to go to the base of the volcano? You’ll have to wait until we get back first!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Let’s hurry up and get it over with then. I want to kick back and relax on the beach too, y’know. Not every day we get a chance like this!
attributes.name: Provence

attributes.content: The beach... and the ocean?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...It doesn’t smell like the sea here.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Phew, how many songs was that? We still have another performance tonight. Don’t get all excited and blow your energy this early.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: No clue, but I’m still having a good time. Frost, you too, right?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: (Plucks a chord)
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Not like it matters. Nothing’s going to burn us out.
attributes.name: Dan

attributes.content: Ahaha... Yeah, I guess that’s true.
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: All righty, then. Before the night comes—
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: Let’s party hard! !
attributes.name: Alty

attributes.content: (Is this the band that guy is so crazy about? They seem like a really noisy bunch. )
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: (Also...)
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: (Something’s weird about them. Can’t put my finger on it though. )
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: (Is it because of this song? What exactly... is this familiar feeling? )
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Have you found the Young Miss? !
attributes.name: Bodyguard A

attributes.content: Hurry up! After them, they couldn’t have gotten far!
attributes.name: Bodyguard B

attributes.content: This way, we have to bring her back!
attributes.name: Bodyguard A

attributes.content: Hey, stop squeezing! How rude!
attributes.name: Fan A

attributes.content: Who the hell stepped on my foot?
attributes.name: Fan B

attributes.content: Who cares about those people? It’s time for the next song! Woooah, it's the first song off their album Deep Color in the Sea!
attributes.name: Fan C

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: (Just now, who were those people looking for? )
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: (Based on the way they’re dressed, they’re no ordinary group of civilians...)
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Excuse me, sorry, let me through please!
Phew, I finally made it out...
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: What’s the hurry?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Eep! Who are you?!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Oh, it’s Thorns... Don’t scare me like that... Anyway, since you’re here, does that mean you’re also a fan of Alive Until Sunset?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Right, I just remembered, you’re also Ægirian. Feels like every Ægir I’ve met has some special connection with them. The sea they sing about is so much more beautiful and intense than the waves of Siesta!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Ah, crap, that’s not what I’m supposed to be talking about!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: The Doctor and the others seem to be in a bit of a pickle, so I’m on my way to help out! Since you’re already here, don’t just stand around, let’s go help out—
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: There’s no need for me to go.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh? Why’s that?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: They have the old geezer from Ursus with them this time. They’ll be fine.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...Uhh, that came out wrong. Rather...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I did not receive any direct communications, which means my presence is not required.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I fully expect that the Doctor has a level of control over the situation. A commander of that caliber would never do anything to endanger our operators.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Until I’ve received specific instructions, there is no need for me to participate in your operation.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Don’t underestimate the Doctor and rush to your own arbitrary decisions. You may end up causing more harm than good.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: That’s what I’ve inferred. Are there any issues?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: None.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: None at all. But, I did figure something out.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: You and I. We definitely aren’t getting along! Imagine having to think that much every time anybody asks you something!
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: Oops, I don’t even know why I’m talking to you. The Doctor asked for my help, not yours. Right?
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: All right, you just sit here and keep enjoying the show. I have somewhere to be.
attributes.name: Vigna

attributes.content: What’s with her tone?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I don’t get it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Have you heard, there’s a barbecue stall in the food court by the beach? They’re having a half-off deal, and the line’s snaking all the way out to the street!
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: How about it? Wanna see what the hype is all about?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Barbecue, in this weather? It’s way too hot, I think I’ll pass...
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, don’t be like that. Is there anything better for the fiery atmosphere of this music festival than some barbecue on the hot beach next to a raging charcoal fire?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: And with so many people lined up, I bet the flavor’s out of this world! It’d be a shame not to give it a try!
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: We’re on vacation, and we came all the way out here. C’mon, my treat!
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: You’re talking just like my aunts and uncles... But fine, since you’re so worked up about this, let’s go check it out.
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Huh? What’s the sound over there?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: What did y’all say?
attributes.name: AUS

attributes.content: C’mon, louder! I can’t hear you—
attributes.name: AUS

attributes.content: ONE— MORE— SONG—!!
attributes.name: Fan A

attributes.content: ENCORE—!!
attributes.name: Fan B

attributes.content: Looks like they set up a temporary stage. Not sure which band is performing on this street though.
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Don’t you think that’s much more interesting than some barbecue? Look at all the people there - what if that’s some famous musician...
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Hey, who hit me?!
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Watch out.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ah, uh.... Um, th-thank you...
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Woah, that’s rad! They’re way too awesome! !
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: I’ve never heard this band before! The scene here is even better than I imagined...
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: I knew I made the right call. Enjoying some good music is way better than barbecue in the middle of the summer! I don’t know when they’re releasing their next album, but I’ll definitely buy it!
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: I see how it is. You’re just not into barbecue...
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: You only now realize...?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Alright, let’s drop it. By the way, where’s your purse?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: I could’ve sworn I had it with me...
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Are you looking for this?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Eep!
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: What have you done? How could you just strike me like that?! Gyaaaaaaaah, my arm! Aaaargh!!
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: Stop your sniveling. It’s not broken.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I hate noise. Should I shut you up some other way?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: (Gurgles strangely as if his throat is being pinched)
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Oh, my purse!
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Two watches, four wallets, and a woman’s bracelet. It seems that being immersed in music can indeed cause one to let her guard down. Everyone is alike in that regard.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: It must’ve been quite easy to get your hands on these things. Otherwise, you wouldn’t have the gall to do it again and again.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Wh-what are you talking about?! These are mine! They belong to me...
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: Rubbish.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Your slipshod lie is an utter waste of my time.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Y-yeah! That clearly is my purse!
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Huh? There really are thieves running around? Maybe those black suits back there were chasing after thieves!
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Black suits? They are not so well-intentioned.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Make sure to hold on to your things. If there is nothing else, I need to bring this one to his other victims.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Wh-wh-wh-what are you talking about?! What victims?!
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: Let me go right now or I’m reporting you to—
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: Silence.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Gyaahhhh! !
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: Um, Mister, of course, we believe you’re in the right, but how do you know where these other victims are?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: How could you find them?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: ...People like these often wait in places where crowds gather, specifically targeting foreign tourists before making off with their ill-gotten gains.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: This is a repeat offender.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I made sure of this when I saw him strike the second time. I then followed him for five blocks to find his group’s hideout.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Don’t act so surprised. You’ll be able to see the others soon, at the police station.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: The one with the scar is your leader, right? He was pretty capable, and took me a bit of time.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...You even caught Old Tom? Tch... Should’ve said so earlier. All right, if you’re that capable, I’ll give up this time.
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: Heh, you’ve been caught, and you’re still talking big?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Siesta is our city. What the hell do you know? So what if I’m caught? I’m just gonna get locked up for a bit...
attributes.name: Unremarkable Tourist

attributes.content: You piece of... Forget it, there’s nothing worth saying to someone like you. Hey, Mister. I really can’t thank you enough.
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: Don’t worry about it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ah, wait, wait up! Where are you going?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: I don’t need any reward.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I was simply on the way to help my friend sort out some trouble. Just took a little detour.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Don’t say that! Let me show some appreciation!
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Besides, you’re pretty cute. Want to get barbecue together?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: I heard there’s a stall with a line around the block, the food there is supposed to be amazing. Since we’re on vacation anyway, how about heading down together to give it a try? I’ll treat you~!
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: Wait a second... Didn’t you just say you weren’t into barbecue? ?
attributes.name: Male Tourist

attributes.content: That was a totally different situation though?
attributes.name: Female Tourist

attributes.content: That should wrap it up for this batch of customers. Do we still have time? Also, the fire’s starting to die down. I need to add more charcoal.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I got you! Watch this!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Is this the barbecue stall everyone’s been talking about? Hm, I must say, this does look quite promising.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: But, the charcoal you’re using...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Haah? Wait up, who the hell are you? Stop messing with my stuff!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hold up, that weapon of yours. I swear I’ve seen it before... Lemme think... Eyy, no, no hints! I know I’ve seen you somewhere before!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Nnnnnnngh... Aren’t you the one following the Doctor around a while ago? Ah, no, that’s not right. That guy doesn’t look like you. ‘cept he was wearing a black cloak, and his sword wasn’t that long.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I got it! You’re the guy who was running circles around the deck yelling his head off, right?! I knew it! I’m sure of it! The one time that mean lady from Yen ran out screaming all those bad words, she was scolding you, wasn’t she?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit, the one running around was Mr. Elysium.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I actually remember what he was yelling: 'I’m the one who drank your smoothie!'
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Miss Leizi was upset with him because she left the smoothie in the refrigerator.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Why was he yelling something like that then? Makes no sense. If you’re gonna do something bad, why shout it out to everyone?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: And how’d you find out anyway, big-ears?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Because he and I were betting on whether the next operator to pass would be male or female. He lost.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I was the one who passed by.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: The hell? And I get treated like a kid?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt, but your meat is about to burn.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Had you turned it over thirty-six seconds ago, you might’ve still been able to achieve a medium-well state. If you turn off the heat now, you could still have a chance to save the flavor.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Also, if I’m not mistaken, the charcoal you just added to the stove is damp, and within the next ten seconds, there is a 73% probability that it will explode.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Hmm, considering the current state of the smoke and the attendant sparks, I’d have to increase that probability by ten percentage points.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Uhh— Pffffff! *cough* *cough* Pffff! Pffff!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Damn it, why does this busted old stove just decide to explode? Can’t you control it a little better? I barely gave it any heat at all!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Sorry, it’s my fault. I shouldn’t have tried to do that after all. I thought it'd be fine if I just helped grill something…
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Huh? Nah, you didn’t do anything wrong.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I’m very sorry, Ifrit, Mr. Thorns. And to all our guests as well. I will compensate you for your losses.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: ...I’m not going to hold you back any more, Ifrit. It’s all you now.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: In other words, you’re quitting? Just giving up?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: No. It’s not that I’m giving up, I just don’t want to cause any more trouble.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: This wouldn’t be the first time, or the second. It’s the same as when I was on the ship. Every time I enter the kitchen, there’s always some kind of accident. Every time, without fail...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Then, try again.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: If there’s something you don’t know, go learn it. If you fail once, fail a second time. If you fail a second time, fail a third time. Now that you know the cause of the accident, avoid it next time.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Compensation is unnecessary. Accidental explosions of this magnitude occur all the time, and are insubstantial.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ifrit, I...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: How long are you going to slack off?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Huh? Huh?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: I said, how long are you going to slack off?! C’mon, damn it! Hold this! I wanna get the stove set up again!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Stop gawking and get back to work already! You’re the one who ran over here asking to help out, so don’t you dare think of slinking off!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hurry it up! Once it’s done, you grill the next batch of meat. I’ll change the charcoal!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Me? Are you sure?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Got a problem? Nobody ever said you can’t. Or, did you decide that yourself?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Tch, what a pain. This box is buried so damned deep in the sand, and it’s so heavy you can’t even dig it out.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hey, where’s the pepper? Why the hell is there no more pepper? Argh...! This is pissing me off!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Excuse me, I’ve heard of some delicious barbecue being sold here. Would you happen to know where that is?
Oh, it’s Ifrit and Cutter.
What are you two doing? Do you require my assistance?
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Ohh! Perfect timing!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Come, come, we could use the help. I really need to dig this out.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: There we go!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I always thought you were only good for playing with sand, but turns out you’re pretty handy!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ifrit, that’s rude...
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: You are always misunderstood because you say things like that.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Huh? Who cares what other people think about me?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm? Is Ifrit not offering me words of praise?
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Is she not? Ifrit sometimes calls people 'dumbasses,' but I understand that this is also a compliment.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Y-you dumbass! Think before you open your big mouth!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ah, she jumped up.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Right, and if you wish to play in the sand, I heard Dr. Gavial is about to plan a trip back home, so you should be able to go play with her. If I remember properly, there is sand near her house.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Who the hell wants to play in the sand? I’m not some kid!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Really? I would very much like to go. How lucky. I’m also a bit homesick, but I cannot return until I finish my journey...
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Homesick? I dunno what that’s like, but as long as I’m with Silence and Saria, anywhere is home. Is Rhodes Island not good enough?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I think our situations are a bit different... But if Ifrit is fine with it, then maybe I should be as well?
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Tch... What’s the difference then? Explain it so I can understand!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Hm... Let me think.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: For me, I often... dream of my home. Of a shaking, golden cradle. Of my mother’s dry and rough hand touching my cheek...
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: This may be nothing more than sand, and it might not be very comforting at all. But in my dreams, there’s still something nostalgic about it.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: It is the place to which I must ultimately return, no matter where I go.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Was that clear enough of an explanation?
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: How did we start talking about this...?
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: All right, let’s cut the chatter. I’ll rebuild the stove rack, so I’ll need you to prepare the new charcoal fire, Ifrit.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: At least, thanks to Mr. Thorns, we now know what to look out for.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: You’re right. Let’s stop thinking about stuff and just get back to work.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh, that guy’s name is Thorns? You’d never guess it from his looks, but he’s actually a pretty nice guy.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Yes. Mr. Thorns is a very good and kind-hearted person.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Kind-hearted? That’s a weird way to put it.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It’s true! I just saw him stop a group of people who were going to harass the Doctor.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Vigna told me those people were trying to stir up trouble, but she also said there’s nobody on the other side capable of fighting, so we have nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: I was going to go help, but it seems like that won’t be needed.
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Oh, that’s right, Mr. Thorns also caught a thief!
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: Huh. He always has that nasty, arrogant look on his face, but he actually does stuff like that? Like, he helps people for fun? Wow.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I thought he was the kind of person I’d never get along with, but it turns out I was jumping to conclusions.
attributes.name: Cutter

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: It’s best to make sure that the person you’re discussing is not within earshot before speaking so loudly.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Eep!
attributes.name: All Three

attributes.content: Why are you still here? !
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I just got back. Here. Pepper.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I’ll be going. No need to thank me.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Wh-who the hell would thank you anyway?!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Ugh, what a weirdo.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: He may be strange... but he truly is a good person, no?
attributes.name: Beeswax

attributes.content: The sea? That’s not quite right. Compared to the sea, this is too humane. Other than the slight salinity of the water, what else tastes of the sea?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Hey, I know you’re there.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ....Hey. Speak. You’ve been standing behind me for quite some time now.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: No way! How’d you catch me...? You must be pretty awesome to be able to sniff me out.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: So, what do you think of the view? Not bad, huh?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: ...The singer from that band. What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh? You know who I am? Are you a fan? Want my autograph?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Not really. Don’t change the subject.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Aww, that’s too bad then. Do you want a CD then?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: No thanks.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I’m just joking. Who just keeps CDs on them anyway? Has anyone ever told you you’re kind of a wet blanket?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Listen, you’re not a wet blanket.  You just don’t care.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: I’m here to appreciate the ocean.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: The songstress gazes out to where the sky meets the sea. Her hair sways in the sea breeze, taking on the shape of the waves.
But this is no ocean.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Siesta’s beach is beautiful. The more beautiful it is, the more I’m convinced it’s not like the sea at all. The place we come from is nothing like this at all.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: People who come here to see the ocean will definitely feel cheated.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Do you ever miss home, Mister?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Songstress, what are you actually here for?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You still don’t get it? Don’t dwell on it too much, I’m just shooting from the hip here. I say whatever’s on my mind. It’s a bad habit I can’t kick.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Don’t avoid the question. You’re an Ægir.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: That I am.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: But I also am not.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: I really dislike when people speak in riddles.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: How about you ask me directly then?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: What, weren’t you going to ask me something? This is a really special opportunity, you know~
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Weirdo. Waste of time.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Didn’t we all come here to waste some time? Being able to treat yourself and waste time is what I call a good life.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: If you’re out there just trying to survive, you don’t get a chance to waste anything.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Maybe you’re right.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: See? Want my autograph?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Give in already. Here, let me just grab something to write on... like this poster...
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: The pink-haired Ægir scribbles swiftly on the poster.
Here. My autograph!
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Hey.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: It’s a reward for talking with me, okay? It’s not every day I meet someone like me, from the old country, in the outside world.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: No. You’re wrong...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I’m not like you.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Thorns opens his eyes wide and looks directly into the singer’s pupils.
The singer blinks, her gaze following Thorns’s hand as it slowly crawls towards the hilt of his sword.
—You didn’t even try to hide it.
You aren’t a big fan of our songs... I know that.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: But I’ll still give you my autograph.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Why? You...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Because you like to dance. There’s no way someone who likes to dance could be a bad person.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Sounds utterly stupid.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Don’t be like that. It’s just something I’ve learned from a whole bunch of people. We’ve all spent a long time on this patch of dirt, and we’ve also learned a lot.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: You didn't grow up in the sea, did you? You're much more at home bouncing around on land than you would be in the water.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: But you’ve never known its gentle side. Oh. You’re not going to miss home.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Iberia is my only home.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: So, the ocean is not your home. You have no feelings for it.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I’ve drunk from it. I don’t swim in a lake. My ancestors went to Iberia, but they could not bear to part from the sea.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I do have feelings for it. But at the same time, I fear it.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Yeah, thought so.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: 'I’ve heard the ripples of your falling tears~♪ Your darkest nightmares, your deepest fears~♪ Your heart cracked into petals of blood...♪'
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: What’s that song?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Nothing special. Just something that came to mind.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: But, I think you’re right, Mister. I think you ought to be afraid of it.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Of course...
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: In the distance, the loudspeakers of Siesta begin to replay the songs from the main event of the music festival, and a familiar tune fills the air.
Elysium has been humming this song every day for two weeks now.
The song seems to be one of the masterpieces from the band the singer belongs to.
And now, the singer...
'The disguise fell off when I remembered, the scar you left me is the pain you forgot~♪
To chase after your shadow, is to chase after naught~♪ With thund’rous voices they’ll rise and call your name~♪ And when they catch your scent, they’ll demand to hear your shame~♪'
Of course, whether or not you fear it, it will come for you.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: It is here. Let’s go. Don’t look back.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: What is she talking about? What is that?
What is that... standing on the water?
The fractured sunset casts faintly mottled shadows upon the water, pulling back the tide in gray waves.
The sound of the world is the sound of breathing is the sound of the ocean, which you listen to without speaking or singing or breathing.
A moment passes, two moments pass, until dozens and hundreds of years pass in silence.
It gazes into you.
Its eyes bore into yours, yearning to slowly crawl in through your wounds.
You are awake as it pulls you into its embrace and you sink into its blood and shadow and sun and hear its eyeless and soundless and lifeless shadow.
As tranquil as a shining star.
Under the surface, there’s a waterway that connects to the ocean... It isn’t strange that it gives off some ocean vibes.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Hey. Hey, Mister, wake up. Snap out of it already.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Hmph. I couldn’t hypnotize you with my song. That makes me a bit jealous.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: You’re the one who should go.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh? Ah... that couldn’t be, yeah? Look, you know that...
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: That’s not something that should be here. If you go now, you won’t die.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I know, but... aren’t you the one who’s supposed to leave right now?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Do you have a death wish?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Listen to me carefully...
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Æ...gir.
Don’t be scared. It shouldn’t be surprising that the ocean knows our names.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: ...No
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: It is not awe.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Urk...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Then what’s your deal then...? Hey, are you having trouble breathing?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Sober up a bit, Mister.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: (Ægirian) Nothing can deprive you of the right to breathe on this land.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: (Free yourself, hurry...! )
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: I fled my homeland. I abandoned my cradle. I’ve forgotten its stories. But I know how it feels.
I believe what I’ve heard whispered in legend. Even in shallow dreams, I’ve felt the bite of swords rending their bodies.
Can I slay the sea itself?
I am homesick. Rather, I’ve imagined it before. But I’ve never actually seen home.
We Iberians have long left the depths of the Abyss.
But I cannot escape from It. None of us can escape from It.
I want to kill It.
Is this a hallucination?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Nope. But you can fight it.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: You seem quite knowledgeable about these?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Is this really the time to be having that discussion? I told you, you should leave now.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Hey, are you trembling?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Maybe I’m getting a bit excited.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Stay if you want. You said I like dancing. What about you then...
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Songstress, do you also like to dance?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: (The sound of bones and flesh and viscera being crushed together)
(A vague, sickening sound)
I love it!
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Seems like you don’t plan to leave then. So, Mr. Ægir, are you confident you can survive?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Will you show me then? I want to see the dance you’re about to dance, one that will paint the sea red...
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: Yes, flourish the sword that weaves with your bounding steps! Spin, pirouette, and glide across the ocean’s surface! Whether you are torn apart or you tear It apart, the beginning or end of your story...
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: You know, the way you talk is really annoying.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I don’t know! I think it’s perfectly fine!
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: So, will you show me your performance, Mr. Ægir? Look at that autograph I just gave you. Just let me know, okay?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: ...As long as you’re not afraid, be my guest.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: It’s good to have an audience, no matter who you might be.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh? I feel like it should be said here—
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: —I’d be honored.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Ahaha, that’s not much of a line... But anyway, you have to live on, Mister.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: I can tell you really care about this. So you have to live on. Don’t die.
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: I don’t plan to die. There’s a friend who wants your autograph, and I have to stay alive to bring it back.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Back, to Iberia?
attributes.name: Aya

attributes.content: No. Though I’ve mentioned Iberia, I’ve also mentioned the sea that my ancestors could not live without.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: But perhaps, my home is no longer in either of those places.
attributes.name: Thorns
